title: Robotics Halloween Competition
description: Programmed a robot to autonomously follow a blue line using multiple sensors and IQ Code, integrating real-time adjustments for precise navigation.

title: Digital Museum
description: This is a project made to highlight the contribution of Black historical figures of Richmond, IN. Made in collaboration between the Black Legacy Project of Wayne County and Earlham College CS4SocialGood.

title: Computing Skills Foundations
description: A collection of projects from my Computing Skills course, showcasing foundational technical skills and applied problem-solving across modules in computer science and data science.
